languages.text: "Твари изрядно напортачили в служебных туннелях — мои ребята обнаружили немало пробоин и других повреждений. Бригады инфернус уже начали их задраивать, скоро все будет как новенькое".

traits.locale_text: "Твари изрядно напортачили в служебных туннелях — мои ребята обнаружили немало пробоин и других повреждений. Бригады инфернус уже начали их задраивать, скоро все будет как новенькое".

languages.text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."
languages.original_text: "Твари изрядно напортачили в служебных туннелях — мои ребята обнаружили немало пробоин и других повреждений. Бригады инфернус уже начали их задраивать, скоро все будет как новенькое".

traits.locale_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

"The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

"The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

"The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

"The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

"The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

languages.text: «Los bastardos han causado un tremendo estropicio en los túneles de mantenimiento; nuestra gente vio numerosas brechas y otros desperfectos. Hemos enviado varias cuadrillas de infernus para remendarlas, así que dentro de poco los túneles estarán como nuevos».
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

traits.locale_text: «Los bastardos han causado un tremendo estropicio en los túneles de mantenimiento; nuestra gente vio numerosas brechas y otros desperfectos. Hemos enviado varias cuadrillas de infernus para remendarlas, así que dentro de poco los túneles estarán como nuevos».

languages.text: 「奴らは整備トンネルをめちゃくちゃにしており、私たちの仲間が、かなりの数の裂け目やその他の被害を見つけました。インフェルヌスのクルーがすでに修復しているので、トンネルはすぐに新品同様になるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは整備トンネルをめちゃくちゃにしており、私たちの仲間が、かなりの数の裂け目やその他の被害を見つけました。インフェルヌスのクルーがすでに修復しているので、トンネルはすぐに新品同様になるでしょう」

languages.text: “那群王八蛋，他们把维修隧道搞得乱七八糟，里面到处都是裂缝，别的东西也被弄坏了。不过，控火行会的成员已经在修理了，用不了多久，隧道就会焕然一新。”
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

traits.locale_text: “那群王八蛋，他们把维修隧道搞得乱七八糟，里面到处都是裂缝，别的东西也被弄坏了。不过，控火行会的成员已经在修理了，用不了多久，隧道就会焕然一新。”

languages.text: "Diese Bastarde haben die Wartungstunnel verwüstet ... unsere Leute haben mehrere Breschen und andere Schäden festgestellt. Infernus-Crews reparieren sie bereits. Die Tunnel werden also in Kürze wieder wie neu sein."
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Bastarde haben die Wartungstunnel verwüstet ... unsere Leute haben mehrere Breschen und andere Schäden festgestellt. Infernus-Crews reparieren sie bereits. Die Tunnel werden also in Kürze wieder wie neu sein."

languages.text: « Ces misérables ont saccagé les tunnels de maintenance. Nos hommes ont repéré de nombreuses brèches, entre autres dégâts. Heureusement, les inferni se sont d'ores et déjà attelés aux réparations et les galeries seront de nouveau comme neuves en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire. »
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."

traits.locale_text: « Ces misérables ont saccagé les tunnels de maintenance. Nos hommes ont repéré de nombreuses brèches, entre autres dégâts. Heureusement, les inferni se sont d'ores et déjà attelés aux réparations et les galeries seront de nouveau comme neuves en moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire. »

languages.text: "Bu şerefsizler, bakım tünellerini mahvetmiş. Bayağı bir çatlağa ve başka hasara denk geldik. İtfa ekipleri bunları onarmaya başladı bile. Tüneller çok geçmeden yeni gibi olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The bastards made a mess of the maintenance tunnels — our folks saw a good few breaches and some other damage. Infernus crews are already patching them up, so the tunnels will be good as new in no time."
